text: Denys Anatoliiovych Monastyrsky (; 12 June 1980 â€“ 18 January 2023) was a Ukrainian lawyer and politician. He was Ukraine's Minister of Internal Affairs from 16 July 2021, until his death in a helicopter crash in January 2023.Parliament appoints Monastyrsky as Ukraine's interior minister , Ukrinform (16 July 2021) ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada Category:Ukrainian lawyers Category:Aviation deaths
